place.name: STANFORD ON SOAR
place.gazetteerText: STANFORD-UPON-SOAR, a parish in the district of Loughborough and county of Nottingham; 1¼ mile N of Loughborough r. station. Post town, Loughborough. Acres, 1,490. Real property, £2,956. Pop., 120. Houses, 24. The manor, with S. Park, belongs to the Rev. S. V. Dashwood. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £435.* Patron, the Rev. S. V. Dashwood. The church is old. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
